featured.text: In this line of work, the person is paid to do daring actions that are deemed too 21 for the regular actor to perform, including jumping from heights, crashing cars, or fighting with weapons.
In the early days of the film industry, actors themselves shot acrobatic acts and dangerous scenes, until they began to get injured.
I mistook the man for a well-known actor and asked for his autograph; it was really _____.
People may choose a name because they are strongly 38 a character in a book or a television series; they may also adopt names of famous people or their favorite actors and actresses.

definition.zh_def: 演員，指在戲劇、電影或電視中表演角色的人。
definition.en_def: A person who performs in plays, movies, or television shows.
definition.example: The actor delivered an outstanding performance in the film.
